pages.text: This $(marked)Primed$() Rite will release a horde of hellish monsters when triggered. The caster should stay at a distance when preparing the Rite.

The Eldritch Trap requires a slightly greater amount of focal power; the caster should be careful, as some of the creatures can cause a lot of damage. Any mob or player will activate this. This Rite cannot be cast in a peaceful world.
